title: Metro Redux: Dilogy (2014) PC by RG Mechanics
description:
Metro 2033 Redux





INFORMATION:
Year: 2014
Genre: Action, 3D, 1st Person
Developer: 4A Games
Publisher: RePack
Publication Type: RePack
Language: RUS | ENG | Multi10
Language Voice: RUS | ENG | Multi7
Tablet: NNM

FEATURES: 
Metro 2033 ReduxVshit Update 4
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice (in the game menu)




MINIMUM

Operating system: Windows 7, Windows 8 (x64 only)
Processor: Dual Core CPU (2.2+ GHz Dual Core CPU or better)
Memory: 2 GB
Video: DirectX 10, Shader Model 3 compliant graphics cards (GeForce 8800 GT 512 MB, GeForce GTS 250, etc)
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 10
Free space on hard disk: 8.5 GB



In 2013, the world has fallen apocalypse, almost completely destroyed humanity and turn the Earth's surface in the poisoned pustosh.Gorstka survivors took refuge in the depths of the Moscow underground, and mankind was plunged into a new Middle Ages. Came in 2033. Underground whole generation. The besieged city stations are fighting among themselves for survival, and outside the cities horrific mutants roam. Your name is Artem. You were born in the last days before the earth was burned, but have grown in the ground. Before you even do not go beyond the city limits, but the fateful event caused you to go into a desperate journey to the center of the underground labyrinth, to warn the survivors of hanging over them monstrous threat. From abandoned underground dungeons under your way will bring to the surface in the wild abandoned land, where your actions will decide the fate of mankind. But what if the real threat - the inside?

INFORMATION:
Year: 2014
Genre: Action, 3D, 1st Person
Developer: 4A Games
Publisher: RePack
Publication Type: RePack
Language: RUS | ENG | Multi10
Language Voice: RUS | ENG | Multi7
Tablet: NNM

FEATURES: 
Metro: Last Light ReduxVshit Update 4
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice (in the game menu)




MINIMUM

Operating system: Windows 7, Windows 8 (x64 only)
Processor: Dual Core CPU (2.2+ GHz Dual Core CPU or better)
Memory: 2 GB
Video: DirectX 10, Shader Model 3 compliant graphics cards (GeForce 8800 GT 512 MB, GeForce GTS 250, etc)
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 10
Free space on hard disk: 10 GB



In the courtyard in 2034. Under the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow subway tunnels in the remains of the human race fighting with death threats - internal and external. Mutants steal the catacombs under the desert surface and hover in the poisoned skies. But instead, to bring together, the city station embroiled in a struggle for absolute power and doomsday device from army depots D6. Brewing civil war can permanently erase humanity from the face of the Earth. In the role of Artyom, burdened by guilt but movable hope you hold the key to survival - a ray of hope in this dark hour ...

Notes : Language selection done in Installer.
